content: say hi to spring with this cute crochet headphone sprout become a happy little sprout plant in just 30 minutes by using a variety of beginner stitches **materials** ▢spring green yarn from red heart ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch
